#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstdio>

using namespace std;
long ptr[1000005];

void solve()
{
	long N, l, i, j, k;
	scanf("%ld %ld",&N, &l);
	
	for(k = 0; k < 1000005; k++)
		ptr[k] = 0;

	for(k = 0; k < l; k++)
	{
		scanf("%ld %ld",&i, &j);
		ptr[i]++;
		ptr[j]++;
	}

	long odd = 0;
	for(k = 1; k <= N; k++)
	{
		if(ptr[k] % 2 != 0 && ptr[k] > 0)
			odd ++;
	}

	//cout<<odd<<endl;
	
	if(odd == 0 || odd == 2)
		printf("Possible\n");
	else
		printf("Not Possible\n");


	return ;
}

int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		solve();
	}
	return 0;
}
